meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing the acetanilide structure.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying different acetanilides to understand their properties better.
meanings.sent2: Pharmaceutical companies often use acetanilides in the production of medicines.
meanings.sent3: The acetanilides at the party were the life of the chemical reaction!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like acetanilides in a laboratory flask.
meanings.sent5: The acetanilides shimmered under the microscope, revealing their intricate structures.

meanings.sent1: The researchers analyzed the various acetanilides to identify their unique properties.
meanings.sent2: Many pain relievers contain acetanilides as active ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The acetanilides in the lab were gossiping about their chemical transformations.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a whirlwind of thoughts, swirling like acetanilides in a beaker.
meanings.sent5: The acetanilides danced together in perfect harmony, creating a symphony of chemical reactions.
